      ~If <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|v>> is <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|null>> or the coercion returns <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|null>>~, function <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|f>> is
